name: Gnome Heist
description:
As the crown of their King has been stolen, two gnomes try to plan a heist into the museum to retrieve thec king's  crown back.  Will they succeed, or will the king wear a bucket from now on?

In this co-op stealth game you need to work together to solve puzzles and be as much as stealthy and goofy as possbile!

It's recomended to play with a controller instead of keyboard.
